name: Senki Zesshou Symphogear XD UNLIMITED
summary:
XD Unlimited is described as a free-to-play "symphonic battle RPG" released for iOS/Android that focuses on the song and fighting elements of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series. Users can select from nine different characters and form a team to battle against enemies while performing special moves recreated from the anime. The combat is called a "real-time auto battle" system which mainly focuses on the user inputting the commands/timing for the use of special moves.

The main quests of the game features story progression through each season of the anime. However, because there are some characters whose role in the story is limited, there are also new stories that feature them, including "daily life" scenarios in addition to "battle" scenarios.
